title: AU Deals: The Scariest Price Slashes in a Steam Halloween Sale, Dropped BLOPs, FC 25, and More!
description: How to stock up on a spooky something for this impending Halloween season.
author: Adam Mathew
byline: The Best Gaming Deals In Australia
excerpt: How to stock up on a spooky something for this impending Halloween season.
text: Hair-raising almost-half-offs.Welcome to a Tuesday of inordinately discounted video games and consoles. What am I doing today? Just sitting here waiting for Batman: Arkham Shadow to go live in (what seems to be) a very gridlocked and laggy Meta Store. It was, of course, the free game being given away with Meta Quest 3 headsets. It's not too late to get on that (slow) train to Gotham. In retro news, I'm celebrating the 31st birthday of Disney's Aladdin, a shining, shimmering, splendid diamond in the rough that was 16-bit graphics. Like a genie who'd just been tricked into granting free wishes, my jaw was on the floor when I first beheld this on Mega Drive. Actual Disney artists had lent their talents to the sprite creation process, and we'd simply never before seen characters this expressive and smoothly animated. It was a veritable Cave of Blast-processed Wonders. A whole new world. A new fantastic point of viewwww...Ok, I'll stop. html:
Hair-raising almost-half-offs.

Welcome to a Tuesday of inordinately discounted video games and consoles. What am I doing today? Just sitting here waiting for Batman: Arkham Shadow to go live in (what seems to be) a very gridlocked and laggy Meta Store. It was, of course, the free game being given away with Meta Quest 3 headsets. It's not too late to get on that (slow) train to Gotham.

In retro news, I'm celebrating the 31st birthday of Disney's Aladdin, a shining, shimmering, splendid diamond in the rough that was 16-bit graphics. Like a genie who'd just been tricked into granting free wishes, my jaw was on the floor when I first beheld this on Mega Drive. Actual Disney artists had lent their talents to the sprite creation process, and we'd simply never before seen characters this expressive and smoothly animated. It was a veritable Cave of Blast-processed Wonders. A whole new world. A new fantastic point of viewwww...Ok, I'll stop.

This Day in Gaming ðŸŽ‚

Aussie birthdays for notable games and hardware

- Street Fighter II': SCE (MD) 1993. Redux

- Disney's Aladdin (MD) 1993. Redux

- Aliens Versus Predator 2 (PC) 2001. eBay

- NFS: Hot Pursuit 2 (GC,PS2,XB) 2002. eBay

- Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story (DS) 2009. Sequel

- Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days (DS) 2009. Sequels

- Rhythm Heaven Megamix (3DS) 2016. eBay

Happy Bday Disney's Aladdin

Nice Savings for Nintendo Switch

Princess Peach: Showtime!

Showtime is more closely aligned with Kirby and Yoshiâ€™s simple, cheery romps rather than Marioâ€™s polished platformers and Luigiâ€™s haunted mansions. Basically, a simple, cheery romp with a variety of neat styles and a fun theater-inspired setting.

Dragon Age The Veilguard

Veilguard combat revolves around your companions, even though you canâ€™t fully take control of them like in previous DAs. Different companions have different combo options together, and there are certainly opportunities to build team synergy. I dig it.
